ProjectsPage.intro_paragraph: Welcome to my projects page! Here you'll find a selection of my work in software development, artificial intelligence, and video game creation. Feel free to explore and reach out if you'd like to collaborate or learn more about my projects.
ProjectsPage.cta_title: Interested in collaborating or learning more?
ProjectsPage.cta_text: If any of my projects caught your attention, I'd love to talk. Get in touch if you want to collaborate, need more details, or simply wish to connect.

hero.title: Tell me about your next bold project
hero.subtitle: Share as much detail as you'd like about the product, game, or system you're imagining. I'll help shape the plan, team, and milestones to bring it to life.

insight.title: The more context, the better the collaboration
insight.copy: What stage is your idea in? Who are the people involved? What does success look like six months from now? Those details help me propose the right technical direction, creative process, and delivery timeline.

email.title: Direct email
email.description: Share the problem you're solving, links to references, or any constraints you're working with.

call.title: Schedule a strategy call
call.description: Book a focused 30-minute session to scope ideas, talk timelines, or explore how we can collaborate.

chat.title: Message on LinkedIn
chat.description: Prefer an async chat? Reach out with a quick intro and I'll follow up with next steps.

form.title: Start a conversation
form.subtitle: Tell me about your vision and I'll respond with next steps, relevant case studies, or ideas to accelerate the work.

message.label: Project details
message.placeholder: What are you building? What outcomes matter most?

form.disclaimer: This form doesn't subscribe you to anything. I'll only use your information to reply to your message.
form.success: Thanks for reaching out! I'll be in touch shortly with next steps.
